On this page

TlDropdown 下拉菜单 ​

基本使用 ​

您可以通过 title 属性设置下拉菜单显示值。

Action 1
Action 2
Action 3
Action 4
<template>
  <tl-space wrap>
    <tl-dropdown title="下拉菜单">
      <tl-dropdown-item>Action 1</tl-dropdown-item>
      <tl-dropdown-item>Action 2</tl-dropdown-item>
      <tl-dropdown-item>Action 3</tl-dropdown-item>
      <tl-dropdown-item disabled>Action 4</tl-dropdown-item>
    </tl-dropdown>
  </tl-space>
</template>

触发方式 ​

触发下拉菜单出现，有这些方式：hover、click、contextMenu。您可以使用 trigger 属性设置。默认值为 hover。

Action 1
Action 2
Action 3
Action 4
Action 1
Action 2
Action 3
Action 4
Action 1
Action 2
Action 3
Action 4
Action 1
Action 2
Action 3
Action 4
<template>
  <tl-space wrap>
    <tl-dropdown title="hover">
      <tl-dropdown-item value="1">Action 1</tl-dropdown-item>
      <tl-dropdown-item value="2">Action 2</tl-dropdown-item>
      <tl-dropdown-item value="3">Action 3</tl-dropdown-item>
      <tl-dropdown-item value="4">Action 4</tl-dropdown-item>
    </tl-dropdown>
    <tl-dropdown title="click" trigger="click">
      <tl-dropdown-item value="11">Action 1</tl-dropdown-item>
      <tl-dropdown-item value="22">Action 2</tl-dropdown-item>
      <tl-dropdown-item value="33">Action 3</tl-dropdown-item>
      <tl-dropdown-item value="44">Action 4</tl-dropdown-item>
    </tl-dropdown>
    <tl-dropdown title="contextmenu" trigger="contextmenu">
      <tl-dropdown-item value="111">Action 1</tl-dropdown-item>
      <tl-dropdown-item value="222">Action 2</tl-dropdown-item>
      <tl-dropdown-item value="333">Action 3</tl-dropdown-item>
      <tl-dropdown-item value="444">Action 4</tl-dropdown-item>
    </tl-dropdown>
    <tl-dropdown title="click & contextmenu" :trigger="['click', 'contextmenu']">
      <tl-dropdown-item value="111">Action 1</tl-dropdown-item>
      <tl-dropdown-item value="222">Action 2</tl-dropdown-item>
      <tl-dropdown-item value="333">Action 3</tl-dropdown-item>
      <tl-dropdown-item value="444">Action 4</tl-dropdown-item>
    </tl-dropdown>
  </tl-space>
</template>

类型 ​

这里的 type 属性与 tl-button 组件的 type 属性一致。可选值有：primary（默认）、secondary、outline。

Action 1
Action 2
Action 3
Action 4
Action 1
Action 2
Action 3
Action 4
Action 1
Action 2
Action 3
Action 4
<template>
  <tl-space wrap>
    <tl-dropdown title="下拉菜单" type="primary">
      <tl-dropdown-item>Action 1</tl-dropdown-item>
      <tl-dropdown-item>Action 2</tl-dropdown-item>
      <tl-dropdown-item>Action 3</tl-dropdown-item>
      <tl-dropdown-item>Action 4</tl-dropdown-item>
    </tl-dropdown>
    <tl-dropdown title="下拉菜单">
      <tl-dropdown-item>Action 1</tl-dropdown-item>
      <tl-dropdown-item>Action 2</tl-dropdown-item>
      <tl-dropdown-item>Action 3</tl-dropdown-item>
      <tl-dropdown-item>Action 4</tl-dropdown-item>
    </tl-dropdown>
    <tl-dropdown title="下拉菜单" type="outline">
      <tl-dropdown-item>Action 1</tl-dropdown-item>
      <tl-dropdown-item>Action 2</tl-dropdown-item>
      <tl-dropdown-item>Action 3</tl-dropdown-item>
      <tl-dropdown-item>Action 4</tl-dropdown-item>
    </tl-dropdown>
  </tl-space>
</template>

尺寸 ​

这里的 size 属性与 tl-button 组件的 size 属性一致。可选值有：s、m ( 默认 )、l。

Action 1
Action 2
Action 3
Action 4
Action 1
Action 2
Action 3
Action 4
Action 1
Action 2
Action 3
Action 4
<template>
  <tl-space wrap>
    <tl-dropdown title="下拉菜单" size="s">
      <tl-dropdown-item>Action 1</tl-dropdown-item>
      <tl-dropdown-item>Action 2</tl-dropdown-item>
      <tl-dropdown-item>Action 3</tl-dropdown-item>
      <tl-dropdown-item>Action 4</tl-dropdown-item>
    </tl-dropdown>
    <tl-dropdown title="下拉菜单" size="m">
      <tl-dropdown-item>Action 1</tl-dropdown-item>
      <tl-dropdown-item>Action 2</tl-dropdown-item>
      <tl-dropdown-item>Action 3</tl-dropdown-item>
      <tl-dropdown-item>Action 4</tl-dropdown-item>
    </tl-dropdown>
    <tl-dropdown title="下拉菜单">
      <tl-dropdown-item>Action 1</tl-dropdown-item>
      <tl-dropdown-item>Action 2</tl-dropdown-item>
      <tl-dropdown-item>Action 3</tl-dropdown-item>
      <tl-dropdown-item>Action 4</tl-dropdown-item>
    </tl-dropdown>
  </tl-space>
</template>

禁用 ​

您可以通过添加 disabled 属性禁用下拉菜单。

Action 1
Action 2
Action 3
Action 4
Action 1
Action 2
Action 3
Action 4
Action 1
Action 2
Action 3
Action 4
<template>
  <tl-space wrap>
    <tl-dropdown title="下拉菜单" disabled type="primary">
      <tl-dropdown-item>Action 1</tl-dropdown-item>
      <tl-dropdown-item>Action 2</tl-dropdown-item>
      <tl-dropdown-item>Action 3</tl-dropdown-item>
      <tl-dropdown-item>Action 4</tl-dropdown-item>
    </tl-dropdown>
    <tl-dropdown title="下拉菜单" disabled>
      <tl-dropdown-item>Action 1</tl-dropdown-item>
      <tl-dropdown-item>Action 2</tl-dropdown-item>
      <tl-dropdown-item>Action 3</tl-dropdown-item>
      <tl-dropdown-item>Action 4</tl-dropdown-item>
    </tl-dropdown>
    <tl-dropdown title="下拉菜单" disabled type="outline">
      <tl-dropdown-item>Action 1</tl-dropdown-item>
      <tl-dropdown-item>Action 2</tl-dropdown-item>
      <tl-dropdown-item>Action 3</tl-dropdown-item>
      <tl-dropdown-item>Action 4</tl-dropdown-item>
    </tl-dropdown>
  </tl-space>
</template>

位置 ​

您可以通过添加 placement 属性设置下拉列表的位置。

Action 1
Action 2
Action 3
Action 4
Action 1
Action 2
Action 3
Action 4
Action 1
Action 2
Action 3
Action 4
Action 1
Action 2
Action 3
Action 4
Action 1
Action 2
Action 3
Action 4
Action 1
Action 2
Action 3
Action 4
Action 1
Action 2
Action 3
Action 4
Action 1
Action 2
Action 3
Action 4
Action 1
Action 2
Action 3
Action 4
Action 1
Action 2
Action 3
Action 4
Action 1
Action 2
Action 3
Action 4
Action 1
Action 2
Action 3
Action 4
<template>
  <tl-space wrap>
    <tl-dropdown
      v-for="placement in placements"
      :key="placement"
      :title="placement"
      :placement="placement"
    >
      <tl-dropdown-item>Action 1</tl-dropdown-item>
      <tl-dropdown-item>Action 2</tl-dropdown-item>
      <tl-dropdown-item>Action 3</tl-dropdown-item>
      <tl-dropdown-item>Action 4</tl-dropdown-item>
    </tl-dropdown>
  </tl-space>
</template>

<script setup lang="ts">
import type { Placement } from "@teal/components/dropdown";

const placements: Placement[] = [
  "top",
  "top-start",
  "top-end",

  "bottom",
  "bottom-start",
  "bottom-end",

  "left",
  "left-start",
  "left-end",

  "right",
  "right-start",
  "right-end",
];
</script>

多级菜单 ​

Action 1
Action 2
Action 3
Action 11
Action 22
Action 33
Action 4
Action 5
Action 1
Action 2
Action 3
Action 11
Action 22
Action 33
Action 4
Action 5
<template>
  <tl-space wrap>
    <tl-dropdown
      title="下拉菜单"
      @visible-change="handleChange"
      @selected="handleSelected"
    >
      <tl-dropdown-item value="1">Action 1</tl-dropdown-item>
      <tl-dropdown-item value="2">Action 2</tl-dropdown-item>
      <tl-dropdown-item value="3" submenu>
        <template #title>
          Action 3
          <tl-icon icon="fa-angle-right " />
        </template>
        <tl-dropdown-item value="11">Action 11</tl-dropdown-item>
        <tl-dropdown-item value="22">Action 22</tl-dropdown-item>
        <tl-dropdown-item value="33">Action 33</tl-dropdown-item>
      </tl-dropdown-item>
      <tl-dropdown-item value="4">Action 4</tl-dropdown-item>
      <tl-dropdown-item value="5">Action 5</tl-dropdown-item>
    </tl-dropdown>

    <tl-dropdown
      title="下拉菜单"
      @visible-change="handleChange"
      @selected="handleSelected"
    >
      <tl-dropdown-item value="1">Action 1</tl-dropdown-item>
      <tl-dropdown-item value="2">Action 2</tl-dropdown-item>
      <tl-dropdown-item value="3" submenu dir="left" :arrow="false">
        <template #title>Action 3</template>
        <tl-dropdown-item value="11">Action 11</tl-dropdown-item>
        <tl-dropdown-item value="22">Action 22</tl-dropdown-item>
        <tl-dropdown-item value="33">Action 33</tl-dropdown-item>
      </tl-dropdown-item>
      <tl-dropdown-item value="4">Action 4</tl-dropdown-item>
      <tl-dropdown-item value="5">Action 5</tl-dropdown-item>
    </tl-dropdown>
  </tl-space>
</template>

<script setup>
function handleChange(value) {
  console.log("一级菜单：", value);
}

function handleSelected(value) {
  console.log(value);
}
</script>

API ​

Dropdown Props ​

属性名描述类型默认值
titledropdown 按钮显示文字。string-
type类型。string - primary|secondary|outline'secondary'
size尺寸。string - s|m|l'l'
trigger下拉列表显示方式。string|string[] - hover|click|contextMenu|none'hover'
placement下拉列表显示位置。string- bottom|bottom-start|bottom-end|top|top-start|top-end|right|right-start|right-end|left|left-start|left-end'bottom'
disabled禁用。booleanfalse
overlayStyle下拉列表卡片样式。object-
overlayClass下拉列表卡片类名。string-
closeDelay延时打开时长。单位：毫秒。number0
openDelay延时打开时长。单位：毫秒。number80
zIndex设置下拉列表的 z-indexnumber1
visible-change下拉框出现/隐藏时触发。出现则为 true，隐藏则为 false。(open: boolean) => void-
selected点击菜单项触发的事件回调。<tl-dropdown-item> 的值（value 属性）(value: number |string|object) => void-

Dropdown Slots ​

属性名说明
-下拉列表项（tl-dropdown-item）。
title下拉菜单的内容。

DropdownItem Props ​

属性名说明类型默认值
value传递给 selected 事件的参数。string|number|object-
disabled禁用。booleanfalse
submenu是否为多级菜单。booleanfalse
dir多级菜单展开方向。可选值：left、rightstringright
animation多级菜单展开动画。stringdownRight|downLeft

DropdownItem Slots ​

插槽名说明
-自定义 Dropdown-Item 内容
title当 submenu 为 true 时，该插槽为拉下项显示的内容。
Pager
Previous pageBreadcrumb 面包屑
Next pagePagination 分页
